effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.
